nodes.text: It is now time for your first exam. I trust you all studied your lessons carefully.
This means, of course, that you should have practiced your Stealth and Perception skills in addition to your books and notes. One learns by doing.

You will have three hours to complete the test. You will spend the remaining classtime in the practice room polishing your skills. You will then have no class on the following day in order to recover from your ordeal.
Which statement is false about 'the Way of the Küchenschabe?'

options.text: One should assess the situation before taking action.
One should go out of their way to avoid dangerous situations.
One should look around for useful places to hide.
Always listen carefully for the sounds of movement or other cues that foes might be present.
All of the Above

nodes.text: When trouble approaches, what should be your first action?

options.text: Draw my weapon and prepare for action.
Look around for someone else to blame for my actions.
Watch from a concealed place to observe the trouble.
Go up and properly introduce myself.
All of the Above

nodes.text: Which of the following is a Rogue's Tool?

options.text: Chalk
A lockpick
A flask of oil
A rope
All of the Above

nodes.text: What is the best way to use a throwing knife?

options.text: Stab your enemy with it.
Hold it by the blade.
Hold the knife by the heaviest part.
Aim carefully and throw the knife slowly.
All of the Above

nodes.text: What is the best way to get out of trouble?

options.text: Charm your way out with a mixture of fast talk and flattery.
Use a rope and grapnel to climb up to the top of the building and run along the rooftops.
Figure out the cause of the conflict and find a solution to the problem.
Avoid getting into trouble in the first place.
All of the Above

nodes.text: What is the one tool that all Rogues must put to good use?

options.text: Their lockpicks
Their brain
Their rope and grapnel
Their good looks
Their diploma from Hero-U

nodes.text: Why is this class called the Disbarred Bards?

options.text: If we called ourselves Rogues, everyone would call us 'Rouges.'
If we called ourselves Rogues, everyone else would be jealous.
So the modern media doesn't do an exposé on the Rogues of Hero-U.
It's hard to be subtle when you wave a red flag.
All of the Above

nodes.text: What is the best reason to show respect to Master von Urwald?

options.text: The Master is an authority figure and we should always show respect towards authority.
It's in the rules.
One does not go out of his or her way to provoke a wolf.
If I do not show proper respect for the Master, I'll be kicked out of Hero-U.
If one wishes to suck up properly, "All of the Above" is the correct answer.

nodes.text: In the 'Way of the Fledermaus,' what is the primary skill utilized?

options.text: One's Agility
One's Moxie
One's Perception
One's Charm
All of the Above

nodes.text: How does one become 'Rogue of the Year?'

options.text: One goes out of his or her way to make friends and influence people.
You do what you can to suck up to the Master.
You practice your skills and learn all the lessons.
You pay more than just lip service to the notion of becoming a Hero.
All of the Above

nodes.name: Test Over and No Class Tomorrow!
nodes.description: Yay! A free day all to myself. What should I do to celebrate?

nodes.message: Shawn's test score is ${ego.test1score} out of a possible 100.
